programme.title: An Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: A San Francisco policeman (Chuck Norris) quits the force to avenge his partner's murder by Asian drug dealers.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A Harlem mob boss (Moses Gunn) hires a private eye (Richard Roundtree) to find his kidnapped daughter.

programme.title: Shaft's Big Score!
programme.desc: Private detective John Shaft runs afoul of feuding mobsters as he searches for the truth behind a friend's death.

programme.title: Shaft in Africa
programme.desc: The private eye (Richard Roundtree) from New York busts the man (Frank Finlay) behind an Africa-to-Europe slave ring.

programme.title: The Dragon, the Hero
programme.desc: A kung-fu fighter goes back to Hong Kong to help a friend fight gangsters.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Stokely Carmichael, the revolutionary leader who created and promulgated the now historic cry of Black Power, talks of his current plans that will bring Blacks together.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.sub-title: If You Don't Know Me By Now
programme.desc: Guests include popular singing group Harold Melvin and the Blue Notes, singer Esther Marrow, and Ida Lewis, editor of Encore magazine.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Soul! staff, Ellis Haizlip, Al Brown, Anna Horsford, Sherri Santifer, Loretta Greene and Leslie Demus read poetry and letters from viewers throughout the country.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Former heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali is interviewed.

programme.title: Coming Soon to Soul Flix
programme.desc: Coming To Soul Flix... Dolemite, Down and Dirty, The Twilight People, The Harder They Come and others.

programme.title: Zulu Dawn
programme.desc: Sir Henry Bartle Frere's vastly outnumbered garrison makes a stand against natives at Isandhlwana in 1879.

programme.title: Blackstar Warrior
programme.desc: In a 1970s version of the future, a space detective searching for the truth about his real mother uncovers his adoptive parents' secret genetics lab and discovers it's controlled by a space nun cult bent on taking over the galaxy.

programme.title: An Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: A San Francisco policeman (Chuck Norris) quits the force to avenge his partner's murder by Asian drug dealers.

programme.title: The American Dream
programme.desc: Two college football players struggle to avoid temptation and keep themselves on the right path.

programme.title: Sweet Jesus, Preacher Man
programme.desc: A black hit man (Roger E. Mosley) poses as a Baptist preacher in a church to take over the local rackets.

programme.title: The Slams
programme.desc: Rival prison factions surround a Los Angeles convict (Jim Brown) who has $1.5 million stashed on the outside.
